contest-event.event-date:
May 15, 2004 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-championship-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Iwan Fox (soprano) Tredegar. Best Horn - Rachel Watkins (flugal) Parc & Dare. Prizes - 1st £125, 2nd £75, 3rd £60.
Dec. 6, 2010, 12:33 a.m. June 30, 2020, 8:26 p.m.
1 Tredegar Town Band Garry Cutt Montage
2 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Bryn James Concerto for Band [Golland]
3 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs Concerto for Band [Golland]
4 Parc and Dare Band Craig Roberts Paganini Variations
5 Burry Port Town David Evans Journey into Freedom
6 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Philip Harper Between the Moon and Mexico
7 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard John O'Gaunt [1900s]
8 Ammanford Silver Band Colin Hogg Quintessence
